replies.body: its an issue because yasuo only has 3 skins

I'm glad to see you're so passionate about Yasuo, he's a lot of fun! Help & Support isn't the best place for a post like this, so if you can maybe come up with some skin ideas, maybe sketch some stuff out if you're keen, you can repost this to the [**Concepts & Creations Boards.**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts)

If you have any other questions, let me know.

Yes that is true not help and support but if we did go to concepts and creation boards what would be the cahnce of that yasuo skin getting looked at or even commented on by a rito member? and how would we even know a new skin was going to come out if someone made a good enough skin? and if we made the skin and u guys made it come out would we get the skin for free? Because i would love to make a skin for yasuo but if i made it i want to have it for free at least + why didnt u give some more champions the void skin or the NEW god fist lee sin skin{{champion:157}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I like Yasuo soo.... I just wanna new skin for hom

I like yasuo plz plz wanna new skin
{{champion:157}}  give him a new skin and i hop that i'll be sick

Dude
1. This is the support section
2. There are about 140 other champions
3. There are champions with less than 3 skins (like Zac)
4. Riot is not just going to make another skin for Yasuo because some random posted about it
5. You are probably getting bored of Yasuo himself, and a new skin will not change that, just play a new champ
